name: Grenadine
description: Imagine the best grenadine you ever tasted, a grenadine that transforms a Shirley Temple or a Tequila Sunrise. That is the difference between most store-bought grenadines and this one, made with 3 ingredients in 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ingredients in a small pot. Cook over medium heat for a few minutes, stirring to dissolve sugar and salt. Set aside to cool.
For the best result, pour into a bottle or jar that has been sterilized (boil it and its cap or lid for 10 minutes). Syrup will hold in the refrigerator for about a month.
